sentence: En un debate de candidatos a la gobernacin, el senador estatal Doug Mastriano pareci comparar la lucha para abolir el aborto con el movimiento para abolir la trata de esclavos, a fines del siglo XVIII y principios del XIX, al invocar a William Wilberforce, un poltico britnico que lider ese movimiento.
title: ANLISIS | La filtracin del borrador sobre el aborto de la Corte Suprema ya ha transformado la poltica en todo Estados Unidos

sentence: In a gubernatorial debate, state Sen. Doug Mastriano seemed to liken the fight to abolish abortion to the movement to abolish the slave trade in the late 18th and early 19th centuries by invoking William Wilberforce, a British politician who led that movement.
author: Stephen Collinson
title: The Supreme Court abortion leak has already transformed politics all over America
